item.title: Shut Up and Take My Money Summary
item.description: Vincent Haupert Presented at the Chaos Communication Congress A talk about some severe security breaches in the fintech startup Number26 app and API. Here is a summary of the key points.

item.title: Banks Love Hackers
item.description:
A recent BBC Click article reporting “Hackers outwit online banking identity security systems” show how ‘hackers’ can poison online banking web sites to trick customers into transferring money out of their accounts.

Banks love this kind of article because if keeps their smoke screen smouldering.
